speaker: Bloggers
vclaim: Elizabeth Warren says, "If there is a need to rape women by Muslims to prove our tolerance, so be it. So thank God for family planning."
date: stated on December 18, 2018 in a Facebook post:
title: Elizabeth Warren didn't say that women should be raped by Muslims to prove our tolerance.
text: There are some weird things that are posted online, but one diary that includes Democracy X takes Elizabeth Warren to another level. A photo of the Senator of Massachusetts recently appeared on Facebook, and attributed it to the following quote: "If there is a need to rape women by Muslims to prove our tolerance, so be it. So thank God for family planning." The words, "That's why we can't let legislators like this be re-elected," are also written through the picture. The article was referred to as part of Facebook efforts to combat false news and misleading information in its news broadcast. ∙ (Read more about our partnership with Facebook.) This quote is completely false. The withdrawal of a quote from light air appears to have first appeared on social media in January 2017. Facebook was published on January 11, 2021 in Nancy Belusi's newspaper, no longer the Speaker of the House of Representatives by Samantha Buterman on January 12, 2021. There was no source with the Mim, and no record of the senator's statements that matched or reworded the comment. Nor have we been able to locate a single media report on what could have been a very newsworthy quote from the United States Senator. Warren was an open supporter of family planning and expressed support for the resettlement of Syrian refugees in the United States. It appears that the Mema was created to disseminate misleading information only and to reduce Warren ' s credibility. "If women need to be raped by Muslims to prove our tolerance, so be it. So thank God for family planning." Warren didn't say that and the quote seems to be quite fabricated. We didn't find any cases of Warren (or anyone else) saying those words. We're assessing this allegation pants on fire! Sharing the facts of 2018-12-19 16:31:44 UTC PoliticsFact 1 1 7 PoliticFact Dating: Pants on Fire Quotes Sen. Elizabeth Warren states that "If it is necessary to rape women by Muslims to prove our tolerance, so be it. So thank God for family planning." Facebook bloggers after Tuesday, December 18, 2018 - December 12, 18. Read more information.
